test_cases.name: TC-BP1. When the request has a receiver-id that does not exist in payee fsp, Then the payer fsp backend should receive an ID not found as error message in the PUT callback response.

assertions.description: Check error description is ID Not Found
Check the response state is PARTY_REJECTED

test_cases.name: TC-BP2. When the receiver fsp responds after the timeout elapses, Then the payer fsp should receive an timed-out as error message.

assertions.description: Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of Server timed out
Check that the state in the final response is PARTY_REJECTED

test_cases.name: TC-BP3. Given skipPartyLookup is set to false, When the incoming request has receiver info already populated, Then party lookup should be skipped.

assertions.description: Check Receiver name should not exist

test_cases.name: TC-BP3. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When one transfer has a succesful party lookup and the other has a failure, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers, And the response to PUT should only have one acceptParty.

assertions.description: Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check that the response has an error code of 4001
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found
Check response has only one transfer result
Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: 6. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When one transfer has a succesful party lookup and the other has a timeout, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers, And the response to PUT should only have one acceptParty.

assertions.description: Check response has the receiver fspid populated
Check response receiver first name is ReceiverFirst
Check response receiver last name is ReceiverLast
Check that the response has an error code of 2004
Check that the response has an error description of ID Not Found
Check response has only one transfer result
Check response has ilpPacket and condition

test_cases.name: 7. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request that has the same receiver id, When acceptParty is set to true for both the transfers in PUT request, Then the PUT response should have details about both the transfers for acceptQuote.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
Check response has quote result for second transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for second transfer

test_cases.name: 13. Given there are 2 transfers in the bulk request, When the sender fsp sends the acceptParty response for only transfers and not the second one, Then the PUT response should have details of the 1 transfer for which the acceptParty response was sent.

assertions.description: Check response has quote result for first transfer
Check response has ilpPacket and condition for first transfer
